Sentencas: Several compositions based on BaO-CaO-Al2O3-SiO2 (BCAS) glass system have been studied in this investigation to see their applicability as sealant for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Development and characterizations of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic sealants for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The glasses as well as the corresponding glass-ceramics have been systematically characterized by differential thermal analysis, dilatometry, X-ray diffractometry, electron microscopy and impedance analysis to examine their suitability as sealant.
Titulo: Development and characterizations of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic sealants for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: While the glass transition temperature (T-g) determined from DTA are within 600-665 degrees C, coefficient of thermal expansion (CTE) can be tailored between 9.5 and 13.0 x 10(-6) K-1.
Titulo: Development and characterizations of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic sealants for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: These glasses are found to be well adhered with metallic interconnects, such as commercial ferritic steel (Crofer22APU), at an optimum sealing temperature of 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Development and characterizations of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic sealants for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The shrinkage behavior of the developed glasses in their pellet form has also been investigated.
Titulo: Development and characterizations of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic sealants for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The resistivities of the glass-ceramics, as obtained from impedance analysis, are found to be within 10(4)-10(6)
Titulo: Development and characterizations of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic sealants for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell application
Development and characterizations of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic sealants for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: Under sandwiched condition between two metals, some of the developed compositions are found to maintain this high resistivity even after 100 h of operation.
Titulo: Development and characterizations of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic sealants for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: One of the glass compositions has shown a low leak-rate of the order of similar to 10(-7)
Titulo: Development and characterizations of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic sealants for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell application
